title: Get Rito too add a warning before issueing a suspension
body: Rito hit me with that 2 week suspension after 2 chat restricitons. If I had known a suspension was next I never would have flamed and i'd still be playing their game and prolly buying skins during that 2 week if they hadn't suspended me without a warning. I believe if riot added the warning it would make it a lot more fair to the player to be suspended if they continue their behavior after getting the warning that " hey! don't flame otherwise you're getting suspended". That's all they needed and I couild still be happy with my full pool of champions... now I have 20 for the next week with no skins and I'm sad. LETS GET RITO 2 ADD A WARNING FAM!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Ekitaih,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IhdBO9Aw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-04-25T01:33:16.753+0000)
>
> Chat restrictions are warnings...

Where is the picture of the dude putting the sticks in the spokes of his bike, and blaming riot?

I get the need for some fair warning before receiving account penalties, but the warnings were in those chat restrictions. Please try to be a little more polite to the other players! The punishment after a 14 day is a permanent ban, and I think you're more than willing to look at what you did wrong and improve so that doesn't happen. Let us know if you need feedback on how to improve or information about the system.

They do issue warnings:

* Chat restrictions

* Short suspensions

* Long suspensions

* Ban
there are varying suspensions? i thought it was only the chat restricts into 14 day into perma
Several levels of chat restriction (3?), and i believe there are two levels of suspension.

It's just;

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day account ban
* Permanent account ban
Wait really? A friend of mine who I basically exclusively play with, so id n=know if he got chat restricted didn't he got straight 14 day banned, with no warnings.

You can be escalated to a 14 day for extremely bad behavior. If it's a chat offense, that's usually some sort of hate speech (such as using racial or homophobic slurs in any context) or threatening harm or urging self-harm.

For non-chat related offenses, such as trolling/inting you won't get chat restrictions, you'll go to an account ban. For MMR Boosters they get a 14 day ban the first time (+loss of all Ranked rewards) and a permaban the second time.
I think this would belong in Player Behavior, not Concepts and Creations. That's just me, though.

The warning is somewhere inside of the User agreements as well... Just don't be toxic. You shouldnt get to ruin 7 or 8 games for 28-80 people(depending on how much all chat trash you talk) before you get suspended.
